div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EncounterHistory|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `EncounterHistory` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Encounter`. Element `EncounterHistory` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter`, but has no comparisons.
Element `EncounterHistory.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `EncounterHistory.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `EncounterHistory.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `EncounterHistory.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `EncounterHistory.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.contained`, but has no comparisons.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `EncounterHistory.encounter` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `EncounterHistory.encounter` has a context of Encounter based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.
Element `EncounterHistory.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.identifier`, but has no comparisons.

Note that the target element context `Encounter.status` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `EncounterHistory.status` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.status`, but has no comparisons.
Element `EncounterHistory.class` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.class`, but has no comparisons.
Element `EncounterHistory.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.type`, but has no comparisons.
Element `EncounterHistory.serviceType` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.serviceType`, but has no comparisons.
Element `EncounterHistory.subject` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.subject`, but has no comparisons.
Element `EncounterHistory.subjectStatus` has a context of Encounter based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.
Element `EncounterHistory.actualPeriod` has a context of Encounter based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.
Element `EncounterHistory.plannedStartDate` has a context of Encounter based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.
Element `EncounterHistory.plannedEndDate` has a context of Encounter based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.
Element `EncounterHistory.length` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.length`, but has no comparisons.
Element `EncounterHistory.location` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.location`, but has no comparisons.

Element `EncounterHistory.location.location` is part of an existing definition because parent element `EncounterHistory.location` requires a cross-version extension. Element `EncounterHistory.location.location` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.location.location`, but has no comparisons.

Element `EncounterHistory.location.form` is part of an existing definition because parent element `EncounterHistory.location` requires a cross-version extension. Element `EncounterHistory.location.form` has a context of Encounter.location based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
